Bash(git commit -m "Fix incorrect PubMed references in disease-virome data

- Updated all PubMed URLs to point to the correct papers
- Corrected publication years and author details where needed
- Updated reference text in disease-virome-network.json for consistency
- Fixed colorectal cancer category (changed from Oncological to Cancer)
- Replaced Ma et al. with Kim et al. for Type 1 Diabetes
- Replaced Liu et al. with Molyneaux et al. for COPD")
